Description: 
This application implements three commands to demonstrate the operations of the extension dictionary.

To run the sample:
Please use Visual Studio 2017 to open the solution called "Samples.sln" and switch to the configuration that matches with the ZWCAD versionï¼Œthen build the application.

To use XRecord.zrx:
1. Start ZWCAD and open a new drawing, and draw a circle.
2. Run APPLOAD command and load the XRecord.zrx file in the output directory.
3. Execute the "AddXRecord" command, which adds the Xdata to the entity.
4. Execute the "ModXRecord" command, which modifies the Xdata to the entity.
5. Execute the "DelXRecord" command, which modifies the Xdata to the entity.
